name: Animatronic Salvage
description:
This is a game I am creating alongside FNAF: It Never Ends. It is inspired by the salvage section in FNAF 6 and the Funtime Freddy section in Sister Location.

So far only the rockstar animatronics will be available. You will need to follow what is shown on the tablet while avoiding their jumpscares. This is really just a minigame for fun.

Controls: Press the 'S' key to lift and lower the monitor.
